HomePage.productsShowDescription: Explore our latest office furniture product, each carefully designed to meet modern office needs.

G1830.title: G1830 School Study Training Chair
G1830.description: Ergonomic, whale design with folding writing table, lift chair, 4 leg chair, bar chair and cantilever chair.

GS-G1760.title: Ergonomic Seat Height Adjustable Office Chair
GS-G1760.description: Low back chair. Body: PP shell (Beige & Black are available) covered by fabric. Seat: 50 density molded foam with 12mm thick plywood panel.

GS-G1900.title: Luxury Modern Deluxe Design with Wheel Leather Home Office Chair GS-G1900
GS-G1900.description: 100% high-quality promise! R&D Department uses ONE-SHAPE steel frame instead of traditional wooden frame, makes GS1900 more stable.

GT1.title: Original Design Ergonomic High Back Office Chair
GT1.description: GT: Original Design. GAOSHENG: over 30 years experience manufacturer. TOYO: over 60 years experience manufacturer. GT1: have mid back type and fabric type.

GT2.title: Premium Executive Office Chair
GT2.description: Luxury leather material, ergonomic design, provides excellent comfort and professional appearance. Suitable for senior management use.

GT3.title: Ergonomic 2D Armrest Tilt and Lock Office Chair
GT3.description: Feature: GT3A-Self Weight Tilt Mechanism. Application: Office environment, hotel reception room, guest room, school education space.

GS-G2041B.title: Cantilever Base Stackable Training Chair
GS-G2041B.description: Design concept: The lines are concise and neat, practical and do not take up space. Easy to move, free combination, limited space can also have a good experience.

GS1795DW.title: Folding Seat Stackable School Training Chair
GS1795DW.description: Office Chair with Wheels, Office School Mesh Folding Chair. GS1795DW Training Chair: A wide variety of functions: foldable, flexible, with a nice streaming style.

GS1805.title: Steel Frame Inside Leather and Fabric Executive Office Chair
GS1805.description: Back: 55D injection foam with 12mm solid steel inside, looks nice and durable. Seat cushion: High density injection foam covered by fabric.

GS2042.title: Mesh Office Chair Task Chair
GS2042.description: Breathable mesh design provides excellent comfort and support. Adjustable height and armrests, suitable for long hours of work.

hero.title: Company Profile
hero.subtitle: Since 1988, we have been redefining workspace and living environments with bespoke furniture solutions.

intro.title: Who We Are
intro.description: Hong Kong Gao Sheng International Co., Ltd. is a research and development, production, sales in one of the modern office furniture solutions enterprise. The company was formerly affiliated to Gao Sheng Office Furniture Co., LTD., founded in 1988, with a long history of 35 years. It is one of the earliest and largest office chair and desk manufacturers in China. The company's main products are office chair, desk as the core products. The product has passed the American ANSI/BIFMA5.1, European EN1335 and Japanese JIS test standards, and conforms to the QB/T 2280-2007 office chair industry standard. Products are mainly used in large brand chain supermarkets, offices, hotels, factories, hospitals, schools, villas, families and other places. As a leading enterprise in the domestic industry, Gaosheng covers an area of more than 100 mu, with 40,000 square meters of large-scale production workshop and more than 600 employees with a large number of professional designers, makers, marketing talents and managers.

certification.title: Certification
certification.description: Up to now, the company has passed ISO9001 international quality system certification, ISO14001 environmental management system certification, China Environmental Label product certification, China three environmental label product certification, CQC China Environmental Protection product certification and other industry authority certification. It has won many titles and honors such as 'Contract-abiding and creditworthy Enterprise', 'China Green Environmental Protection Product', 'China Famous and Excellent Product', 'Member Unit of China Council for the Promotion of International'

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We create more than just furniture. We create more possibilities, and every day, our ultimate goal is to provide you with a suite of product solutions that create a sense of place where people can achieve anything possible. With unique innovations, we continue to anticipate changes in the way people work, keep up with The Times, and design for a comfortable workplace to bring you the most satisfying solutions.

item1.title: Foundation
item1.description: Gao Sheng Office Furniture Co., LTD. was established.

item2.title: Studio Launch
item2.description: Established dedicated studio for boutique residential staging.

item3.title: Hospitality Projects
item3.description: Delivered 6 showcase suites for Chengdu Boutique Hotel Group.

item4.title: APAC Expansion
item4.description: Established logistics hubs in Singapore and Bangkok to support regional delivery.

globalService.title: Global Service Capability
globalService.description: At present, the company's markets are all over Europe, North America, Southeast Asia, the Middle East and other countries and regions, involving more than 100 countries. And long-term cooperation will be with Huawei Technologies Co., LTD., Danaher Group, Weilan Power, Baosteel, Samsung Electronics, Hilton Hampton Hotel, Melbourne urbanest student apartment, Dubai Land Bureau, Dongfeng Renault, Meitu Company, Abbott Pharmaceutical, CRRC Group and other well-known brands. In order to maintain the quality and service, we have set up local service outlets in most of the local countries, and always firmly adhere to the work style of user experience satisfaction first, sales second.
